sk1.name: Laser
sk1.desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target for 3 seconds, causing it to miss all physical attacks. Its range is doubled with Aghanim's Scepter.

sk2.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
sk2.desc: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. The number of missile targets is doubled with Aghanim's Scepter.

sk3.name: March of the Machines
sk3.desc: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

sk4.name: Rearm
sk4.desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
